MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G44 and G73 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:57pm to repair an underground cable fault located at Curtis Avenue  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 8:10pm on Thursday the 22nd April.
